education_text.0: Before graduate school, he worked at the      World Health Organization World Health Organization's Global Programme on      redirect    AIDS, developing software for      Statistical model statistical modeling and forecasting of the      HIVHe was an early member of      Google Brain Google Brain,          a team that studies scale artificial neural networks, and he has headed artificial intelligence efforts since they were split from Google SearchDean was the subject of controversy when the ethics in AI researcher,      Timnit Gebru Timnit Gebru, challenged Google's research review process, ultimately leading to her departure from the companyDean was interviewed for the 2018 book Architects of Intelligence
